Review: I went on a Wednesday morning, so it wasn't very crowded. A couple fishermen were on the beach at the time. It's a pretty nice place to park for free and use the beach. They have public bathrooms and so e outdoor showers too.

Location.Name: Varn Park
Location.Address: 3665 N Ocean Shore Blvd, Flagler Beach, FL 32136

Review: A great place to take the kids or grandkids for breakfast.

Location.Name: Sunrise Cafe
Location.Address: 779 S Nova Rd, Ormond Beach, FL 32174

Review: I loved the boneless wings and the beer. Tiffany and Brandi were wonderful bartenders. I hope to see them again when I return to the area. I'll definitely make a stop by here again.
Great place to go on the beach. I love how there are plenty of outdoor showers to wash off.

Location.Name: Frank Rendon Park
Location.Address: 2705 S Atlantic Ave, Daytona Beach, FL 32118

Review: I love the variety of ice cream they offer. This is a great place to take the kids or grandkids after a fun day on the beach.

Location.Name: Cow Lick's
Location.Address: 2624 S Atlantic Ave, Daytona Beach, FL 32118

Review: Food cooked to perfection,  Delicious.  Clean restaurant.  Friendly staff.

Location.Name: PDQ Restaurant
Location.Address: 6305 Falls of Neuse Rd, Raleigh, NC 27615

Review: Outstanding service and food.  Beverages were continously refilled.  Did not have to ask.

Location.Name: Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews

Review: Fast, efficient staff with good food.
This store has almost everything you need.
Good food, friendly staff.

Location.Name: The Cowfish Sushi Burger Bar
Location.Address: 4208 Six Forks Rd Ste 100, Raleigh, NC 27609

Review: This was a great local business to go to, will be returning soon!
Will not be ordering from here again. Poor food quality and service.
Absolutely love this location!! This one employee I believe his name was Jamarr was just amazing and was a joy to be around!
Employees provide decent customer service, Ive had better experiences at other locations.
Great service, love the employees there!

Location.Name: Cold Stone Creamery
Location.Address: 150 S Equity Dr Ste A, Smithfield, NC 27577

Review: One of my favorite Chick-fil-A's to go to because of its speedy service
Great service and food never fails to satisfy me.
Excellent food and service will be returning here again!
This is nice change of pace in Smithfield, I enjoyed my visit but I dont think I will be jumping at the chance to go back.
Service was good, food was not that filling and next time I would get something else but still not bad.
I got their boba and it tasted really bad and they take so long
Kelsey was so sweet! She had great customer service I will definitely come back because of her!

Location.Name: Today Asia Market
Location.Address: Plaza, 1207-I Kildaire, Kildaire Farm Rd, Cary, NC 27511

Review: I was very satisfied they did a great job and they were very nice and respectful and Briana was awesome

Location.Name: Aveda Institute Chapel Hill
Location.Address: 201 S. Estes Dr. University Place 200-B, Chapel Hill, NC 27514

Review: The associate was very rude

Excellent experience! Great service from the host, to the servers who ran out food, & the bartender was so friendly! Everyone was very accomodating and created a great atmosphere. Prices are great, food is good, & service was fantastic. Will be back!
Incredible mocha! Such a rich & creamy chocolate flavor. One of the best I've had. Very chill vibe with a beautiful patio as well. Will definitely be coming back!

Location.Name: Black and White Coffee at Videri

Review: What a fun course! All really small holes like 80-100ft but that means there's a chance of a hole in one on everyone!
Wow what a view. Timed it perfectly and got there for sunset. 'Twas incredible. Quite the vertical hike though, so be prepared!
Always incredible. Whenever I'm near one I will always go. Tried the peppermint bark pancakes this time and they really know what they're doing.

Location.Name: Snooze, an A.M. Eatery
Location.Address: 4901 E Ray Rd STE 120, Phoenix, AZ 85044

Review: Crispy pickles & buns makes for a great burger
Man, I was not expecting much going here late at night, but they blew me away! Everything I tried was fantastic. Didn't even know what half of them were, but very glad I came here!

Location.Name: Gussie's Tamales & Bakery
Location.Address: 2200 N Piedras St, El Paso, TX 79930

Location.Name: Pyramid Mtn Trailhead
Location.Address: Upper Red Rock Loop Rd, Sedona, AZ 86336

Location.Name: Charlie's L'Etoile Verte
Location.Address: 8 New Orleans Rd, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928

Review: Great service and easy to work with from day one.

Wanted to give this place five stars for the amazing service alone and would do 4.5 if it was an option. I ordered the pulled pork and it just was not that great. Any time I get barbecue, I am hoping for quality sauce with tender meet but in this case it was rather dry. Might have just been a bad choice that night on my part and will definitely go back to try again. There are plenty of other menu items that sound great.
Great dining experience! Very friendly and knowledgeable staff serving up some amazing dishes. I definitely recommend starting with the biscuits.
Great food! Love the smoked chicken and the side options are all great as well.

Location.Name: KinFolk
Location.Address: 4430 Betsy Kerrison Pkwy, Johns Island, SC 29455

Location.Name: Cantina 76
Location.Address: 219 Farm Lake View Rd, Kiawah Island, SC 29455

Review:
Friendly staff but consistently have my drink made incorrectly and shorted. As a former Starbucks barista, it’s particularly easy to tell when something is wrong in terms of drink components. Then, as an average consumer, it’s particularly easy to tell when 20% of the drink never even made it in the cup. I’ve made several comments about these reoccurring problems and they continue to repeat themselves. Wish the store manager and team leads would take note and make an effort to fix them.

See the photo for a drink less than 3 minutes old, before I ever took a sip.

Another photo from a totally different day. Same order. Just got it.

Beautiful hidden gem in eastern Nevada. This national park is one of the smaller ones, but doesn’t necessarily feel that way staring up Wheeler Peak and taking the drive to the trailheads. The glacier and Bristlecone trail was my favorite, but I’m coming back for a Wheeler summit soon!

Love it! Stopped in town for lunch and wanted some pie— we saw thin, wood oven crusts and were sold. Every ingredient on the pizza was obviously real quality, too. Overall, great food. Made
Better by a neat environment and friendly wait staff.

Very solid tex mex spot in town! Food was good and served in very generous portions, prices were fair, and our waiter was spot on.

The only let down was the frozen marg — it was just way too subtle on all fronts.

Overall, a worthy stop if you want to escape the regional theme of hatch chile everything.

Really liked stopping here for a dinner party. Staff was on top of everything despite how it busy it was. Food was fairly priced and pretty tasty. The cocktails however were a bit steep $$$. We enjoyed that there was outdoor seating available, but if you aren’t familiar with CO weather, bring a jacket!

Location.Name: The Canteen Tap House and Tavern

Review: Good brunch spot! Only cons were the insane wait times. Otherwise, food was enjoyable and the staff was nice. No crazy prices either!

Visiting from out of town and happy with this pick up! Definitely better than the more typical chain. Prices were fair, it was ready for takeout on time, and the staff was friendly. Overall a good experience!

These folks are so great and very reliable. I don’t live in ABQ, but I have family who does and I always use this company to send flowers for various occasions. The arrangements look beautiful every time, are priced fairly, and delivered on time without fail. My family members love that the arrangements last, too.

Overall, a wonderful “every day” florist.

Location.Name: Albuquerque Florist
Location.Address: 3121 San Mateo Blvd NE, Albuquerque, NM 87110

Review:
An absolute treat. We booked this evening to dine in a while back (long list) and are thrilled it finely came to be. Our table was ready on time, the service was very professional, and our food was just delicious. Everything was cooked exactly as ordered and easy to enjoy. Quality ingredients were front and center, no doubt.

If I could only recommend one line up, our tables favorites were:

The Secret Cove (cocktail)
Lobster Risotto
Beef Wellington
Sticky Toffee Pudding (*must*)

Yes, it’s an expensive dinner but a worthy treat for locals and guests alike.

Location.Name: Gordon Ramsay Hell's Kitchen Lake Tahoe

Review:
Very okay food on a busy corner of the lake. We loved the outdoor seating and really appreciated being able to bring our puppy! The food was just mediocre, nothing terribly special. Mostly sandwiches and salads available, not many hot options.

**My observation is it would be a veggie-friendly place for those with dietary preferences or restrictions.

Location.Name: Tunnel Creek Café
Location.Address: 1115 Tunnel Creek Rd suite a, Incline Village, NV 89451

Review: The best service I have ever received at a Starbucks! Firstly, I believe her name is Morgan, deserves a raise or something. She was extremely joyful & friendly. I have never met such a welcoming employee before. She looked like she enjoyed her job too! So sweet. Secondly, our drinks came out correctly! Wow! We will be coming back & spending our money here. 💗

Loved this place and would love to come back! Beautiful atmosphere outside! Dim string lights, fire pit, beautiful trees, right by the water, live music. Whoever played on the night of Nov 13 2020... he did GREAT! I got the Parmesan crusted grouper with lemon cream sauce, whipped potatoes and asparagus. It was absolutely delicious. Highly recommend!

Location.Name: Fishcamp on Broad Creek
Location.Address: 11 Simmons Rd, Hilton Head Island, SC 29926

Review: GREAT service! The place was clean and well kept. The man behind the counter was friendly, welcoming, and upbeat. Not many places like this anymore. Cool atmosphere too.

Location.Name: Corner Perk Brunch Cafe & Coffee Roasters

Review: Clean, nice store. The customer service at the Starbucks inside is not good though.

Location.Name: Barnes & Noble
Location.Address: Indigo Run, 20 Hatton Pl #200, Hilton Head Island, SC 29926

Review: The staff here are incredibly rude. No smiles, no manners, they just look incredibly bored & annoyed to be taking orders. Not a friendly, welcoming place. This Panera on N. Roxboro also messed up our order 3 separate times... not an exaggeration. The first time they gave us a chicken salad with no chicken. I like Panera as a whole, good menu, but this one in particular is bad. Go to N. Roxboro Chick-Fil-A instead— amazing service there!!!

Location.Name: Panera Bread
Location.Address: 3800 N Roxboro St Suite 100, Durham, NC 27704

Review: 5 stars! I have 5 tattoos. My first was done at Dogstar when I was 18, and my last was done at Dogstar at 24. I will not be going to another shop again for a tattoo. Dogstar is CLEAN, PROFESSIONAL, and PATIENT. The other shops I’ve been to do not compare. Aldo did my last tattoo (Oct 2020) and did a GREAT job. Though my tattoo was simple & small, he did EXACTLY what I wanted and his lines were very clean & straight! Highly recommend!

The food was great! I got the seafood casserole— delicious but the brussel sprouts on the side were burnt, and my husband got the ribs. He loved that too! The lemonade and sweet tea were not great and we had to ask for refills but that’s okay. Would definitely come back again.

The service here was absolutely awful. I could have received better service at a McDonalds. When our food was brought to our car, the woman said nothing and ignored us when we said thank you. I asked for ketchup, which apparently really put this lady out, and she walked away without saying anything. A minute later she comes back, holds up the bin to my face, doesn’t say anything, and when I say thank you she ignores me and walks away. If you want to see how a Chick-fil-A is supposed to operate, go to the one on N. Roxboro. This one is a sad excuse. Won’t be coming back.

I had an AMAZING experience at NY Bride & Groom. I didn't know what to expect by looking at the plaza on the outside, but inside it is clean and beautiful! 1. Beautiful dress selection 2. Friendly staff (Their staff is not commission based to they aren't breathing down your neck the whole time) 3. Freedom to go pick out all the dresses I wanted to try on by myself 4.) I actually had privacy.. You can try on dresses in a separate room with your friends/family 5.) Take your time... they do not make you feel rushed! The ONLY complaint I can think of is that they don't have a very good selection of lower priced dresses. Would 100% recommend this shop!

Location.Name: New York Bride & Groom of Raleigh

Review: Usually get breakfast. Used to be absolutely brilliant and lightning quick. Now, they’re only using one out of two kiosks to hand out food. Has significantly delayed the ordering process and I’ll probably start going elsewhere for breakfast
they always leave something out in the drive through and you have to go all the way back to get it.
The drive-through was extremely long but we were in and out within five minutes with our food along with great service!! Y’all doing God’s work out here haha
Didn't get a chance to dine here they were PACKED out on a Saturday morning and that's a good sign to me. I will be back to taste and see for myself.

First timer and was not disappointed. I came around 4:30 on a Monday not crowded at all. I got the falafel platter with chicken and steak kabobs. Everything was fresh and tasty shared it with my husband he could have eaten it all by himself. I could have probably eaten twice. No complaints for $18 and not having to cook haha. Hope to be back soon Sam.

Ps the owners are super friendly and down to earth. Added bonus.

Location.Name: Taza Grill
Location.Address: 6325 Falls of Neuse Rd #19, Raleigh, NC 27615

Review:
Loved it. We've been members for 8 years now.

This new location has the same feel of Yonkers rd. Same mission. Same friendly faces.

Smaller environment which I personally liked more than I thought I would. Very relaxed.

Different location. Different speaker but same powerful word from God. I hope to go back here soon I really enjoyed it.

1st time won't be my last.
We went right at 11am on a weekday. No wait. Food was hot and fresh just like the workers.

Shared the kids chicken lo mein nice portion for a petite woman and 2 small kids. Just over $5

Had plenty carrots,  broccoli, and chicken. Great flavor oily but that's typical lo mein for ya.

Overall great experience and the workers were really nice and helpful.

We go frequently every 2 weeks or so "just" to play the games. We get maybe $10 in tokens and have family fun night it's worth it to us.

The machines don't always work but it's a quick fix just ask a worker to fix it.
Nothing special. Tried the Pepperoni and the White. Very basic and overpriced. Lacked flavor. Waited wait too long for 2 slices of pizza. If I hadn't had better maybe I would think differently.
1st time visit nice and shady for the summertime,  tennis courts, basketball court, swings for babies. Definitely something for the whole family. Shelters for events. 👍👍

First visit. Got the lunch special 1/4 chicken, yellow rice and black beans. I came at 11 and didn't have to wait. When we were leaving closer to 12 there was more of a wait.

Good portion of food for under $8. Enough for a young woman, and 2 small children with a small amount leftover. Not enough for a grown man in my opinion.

Pros/Cons: The green sauce was very tasty I would ask for more than the one it comes with. My children really enjoyed the chicken, rice, and beans I would have liked more seasoning for the chicken but found it all still very tasty.

Overall: Nice experience and friendly staff.

Location.Name: Tropical Picken Chicken
Location.Address: 404 E Six Forks Rd, Raleigh, NC 27609

Review: Good cookies customer service could use a little improvement.

Location.Name: Crumbl Cookies - Raleigh
Location.Address: 2920 Sherman Oak Pl Ste 100, Raleigh, NC 27609

Review: I didn't "feel" safe. And the room didn't "feel" clean but in Reality the room was fine and no one bothered us. It was a very busy weekend booked through priceline express wouldn't have been my choice but my family slept soundly, we all had hot baths and had shelter for the night. That's what you want in a hotel and we got that.

I have been a patient at Raleigh OB/GYN for about ten years. From regular annual visits to walking with me through three pregnancies/deliveries, I have been very happy with all the providers in the office. In particular, Dr. Brimmage and Dr. Briscoe make me feel comfortable, heard, and cared for. I appreciate their time, insight, and care.

Location.Name: Raleigh OB/GYN Centre
Location.Address: 4414 Lake Boone Trail Suite 405, Raleigh, NC 27607

Review:
Great experience with Rachel this afternoon! She was welcoming, knowledgeable, and talked me through everything she was doing. Very happy. Thanks, Rachel!

Coming back to add that my most recent experience was 10/10!!! Rachel is the best and made a potentially uncomfortable and awkward appointment easy and not at all stressful! So happy. Thank you again, Rachel!
This is a weekly stop for my family. Outstanding team! Always on top of it. Excellent adaptations for covid times. Thanks y’all!

We’ve been to The Station at Person Street several times and have always been super impressed. Great atmosphere, nice outdoor dining when the weather permits (or covid requires!)

The food has always been awesome. Today we tried the DIY Peanut Butter and Jelly and it was so interesting and delicious. Crab dip was also a major hit at our table.

We had some issues with orders/delays during our most recent visit. However, Kai, the manager was receptive to our concerns, very empathetic, and eager to make it right. Really positive experience.

We’ll be back for sure!

I really enjoy coming to this Panera location. It is very convenient to the hospital and the environment in the mid morning is quiet and conducive to getting work done.

Today my order was lost, but the staff was apologetic, prompt in rectifying the situation, and went above and beyond to make it better. Excellent customer service!

Awesome experience! Chose our beach house rental based on proximity to Corolla Adventure Park. Awesome, engaging, and knowledgeable staff. Definitely will be back!!

Edit to add: we came back and did axe throwing. It was awesome! Nick was great in helping us learn about the different ways to throw. We had a great time. The root beer floats at the end were nice, too.
Cute little spot tucked in the beautiful Corolla Historic Village area. Ordered a juice and a açaí bowl, both very nice. Helpful and friendly staff!

Positive first haircut experience for our 16 month old. He was quite upset initially but by the time we left he was so relaxed, he nearly fell asleep! The slide and balloon were great for my older daughter to play with while we waited.
Well organized with friendly and knowledge staff. The DMV can be stressful, but this office is quite pleasant!
Both the baklava and chocolate funfetti were great!
On our seven day trip we did not have one day where we had full utilities (power, gas, water).

Read the fine print. We had a family emergency and needed to cancel. They told us there was a seven day cancellation policy. Since we were 72 hours out (which is their normal cancellation window) they said they would have to charge us. Forget that we plowed on and emailed letting them know that. I received confirmation they had gotten my response and knew we were coming. When we got to the hotel they told us we had cancelled and that we were lucky to get a room. Thankfully I had kept all emails where it was clear I had not cancelled.

Basically they were going to take our money and then put the room up for renting to someone else essentially getting double payout. It was extremely shady. Also be warned it was packed and no one was wearing masks. There wasn’t daily housekeeping so lord knows it wasn’t clean. Just be warned.

Wonderful food and wonderful service. Margaritas are amazing and HUGE. Waitstaff is great and patient. Seriously. I watched one waiter give a deeply confused patron a five minute explanation on what a quesadilla is. Bless.

Location.Name: Blue Bay Mexican Grill
Location.Address: 539 Ocean Blvd, St Simons Island, GA 31522

Review: Hands down the best dentistry in Baton Rouge! They use the latest technology to ensure a pain free experience and offer fair prices. The office staff is super helpful and accommodating. I highly recommend!

Location.Name: Levy and Vutera Family Dentistry
Location.Address: 6509 Government St Ste A, Baton Rouge, LA 70806

Review: I received a speeding ticket in Virginia as a non resident.  I had no idea what to do.  Dawn helped me so much with my speeding ticket!  She took care of everything which is saying a lot during these crazy COVID times.  I would recommend this firm to anyone who needs guidance and to have their ticket taken care of quickly!
Two words: Ice. Wine. It’s liquid gold! Taproom was clean and spacious. Lots of games to keep the kiddos entertained.
Stopped in for doughnuts and left with so much more! Staff was wonderful and friendly! They adhered to covid restrictions and everything was so clean. Food was amazing!
Wonderful tasting room and great white wine! Try to get Chrissy as your guide—so knowledgeable and wonderful service!

Great restaurant and super nice people but be warned the mobile ordering is unreliable. Had to run home to grab my wallet only to find out they charged me twice 😬. Luckily they assured me they are working on it but I’ll be sticking to drive thru ordering from now on.
Hands down the worst movie theater I have ever been to. It’s dirty and has unclear directions. Staff is rude. Do not go here.

Location.Name: Showcase Cinema de Lux Legacy Place

Review: The site is a death trap. Not woman's work filling those trucks of the shoot. Looks to have been built in sixties. It's hard and down right dangerous. The pay is not compensation enough as hard as you have to work. They'll hire anybody, likely for reasons I expressed, very few stay.

Love the splash pad, swings, jungle gym, landscaping is small child friendly. Nice location as well. Plenty of parking.
We will be returning💯

The first time I went there the employees seem professional mechanics. About to take my Jeep back to them to fix some things and get it inspected. I'll report back if my opinion is debunked..... Or not🙏
I'll never take any of my babies there. Butchers

This is the vet I will trust to be my cats primary physician, all day. They did a wonderful job on her spay, and I didn't have to wait two weeks for an appointment. They price was reasonable as well. Good ppl.
Usually fast, always got order right,

Very glad I was lead to choose this dentistry office. The staff is kind and sympathetic which means allot.
There dentist is kind, understanding and very capable. I'll be going to them for a long time, gladly 💯

Location.Name: Mount Holly Dentistry
Location.Address: 126 W Charlotte Ave, Mt Holly, NC 28120

Review:
Seems honest but I can't be absolutely certain as I haven't had to have my vehicle serviced by them as yet. Very professional staff. When I do have to be serviced, that's where I'll be going.
I'll update when the time comes 👍

Location.Name: A&A Automotive of NC, LLC
Location.Address: 4404 Hickory Grove Rd, Mt Holly, NC 28120

Review: Been to Neomonde Mediterranean as a Postmate driver twice to order food for my customer,  I was told by the restaurant staff on the first occasion that they lose out on tips when postmates pick up food so they don't like postmates, Was here again today and was told by the staff they don't want postmates here  but they deal with it . So let me point out a few things one as a driver I will normally go back and try new restaurants I learn about as I go, But what about the customers who are handicap? Or who are in the middle of work ? or just plain busy? I can't imagine the food being any good cause the staff represents the worst in humanity .Imagine being a driver and having to listen to this when Im here for your customers , I wish I could give negative stars for this place

Been to this Chick fil la a couple of times normally good service considering the current times we are living in, Not sure who the Asian woman who took my order yesterday afternoon is  but she had a bad attitude , Terrible customer service I've been to Chick-fil-A from Florida to Portland, I didn't think it was possible to encounter find someone with a bad attitude working at a Chick-Fil-A , But we found one .

Absolutely Amazing!!!  We heard so many great things about going to the farm during the Christmas season.  The hay ride through the woods with all the beautiful Christmas lights and Christmas songs definitely put you in the Christmas spirit.  Completely forgot about Covid while being there.  You do have to wear a mask.  But it's not a problem.   After the ride we had a delicious southern meal.  The wait staff & employees were outstanding.  It was over a 3 hour round trip for our family. But well worth it.  If I could give more stars I would. So looking forward to going back again.  When I do I will go back into their really nice gift shop & purchase something.  Merry Christmas Mike's Farm!!!

The staff at this Dairy Queen location have always been top notch since the day the store opened.  I have been dining here from day one.  Love the place & the food.  Especially the Blizzards.  Enjoy!!
The food is Delicious.  Staff is very friendly & professional.  Highly recommend checking in on line before going.

Location.Name: Texas Roadhouse
Location.Address: 201 Grand Hill Pl, Holly Springs, NC 27540

Review: Awesome Dollar Tree!!  Except for the Checkout.  One cashier for a lot of people.
Love it!!  Old fashioned Tastee- Freez.
The staff always make sure the guests have a great time.  The Pool boy goes above & beyond.  Thanks Gary.  You Rock!!
Delicious!!  Staff was Awesome as always.  Highly Recommend this location.
Love it!!

Waitress was very friendly.  But food took forever to be served to my family.  Reason was kitchen is behind the waitress told us.  From where we were sitting. Sounded like the kitchen was having a party.   Laughing & chatting away.  I'm sure it wasn't about our food.  Will not go back to this location.
